explains: v. 审问，讯问，质问；（在计算机或其他机器上）查询

sentences.en: The lawyer took two hours to interrogate the witness.
sentences.cn: 律师费两个小时的时间讯问证人。

sentences.en: The lawyers took two hours to interrogate the witness.
sentences.cn: 律师们花了两个小时的时间讯问证人。

sentences.en: The police took a long time to interrogate the offenders fully.
sentences.cn: 警察花了很长时间对人犯进行了详细的审问。
